text: The Kaarepere railway station is an historic railway station located in Kaarepere, Estonia. The station is listed as a heritage building by the Estonian government's Muinsuskaitseamet (Estonian National Heritage Board), number 23960. Construction on the building was finished in 1927. A parking lot was added next to the station in 2011. Front of the station building. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Estonia
title: Kaarepere railway station
